title: Cornucopia
author: Cornucopia
created_time: October 09, 2022, 07:52:27 AMLast edit: October 02, 2023, 06:00:30 AM by Cornucopia
content: I am still selling this - providing active support and guide still works as of late 2023!Wondering how people on forums can sell premium accounts? Maybe you want to know how you can start to sell yourself? Or just want to stop paying for 5 subscriptions? You're in the right place! I have been a seller, and this is exactly what I will teach you. Have any questions? Send me a PM!I am the original seller of this guide and so can provide customized support if needed. PayPal is accepted through my autobuy link, as well as BTC BTC and other cryptoPurchase my guide herehttps://allaccountsfree.sellix.io/See my EARNINGS selling accounts here - done consistently following the guide, you can make between 400-800USD per month with around 10 minutes of daily work. Or just keep the accounts for yourself!https://ibb.co/album/z6PSVLWho am I?I have been involved in selling accounts since 2017. In that time, I have sold thousands of USD worth of streaming, VPN and gaming accounts. I have also sold a guide on the process for the last year, with over 1000 sales and 80 plus reviews. The guide has been given a big update for 2022. See my sales proof here - https://ibb.co/x5RCdf8. This experience means I am not just a random seller selling a resold guide - I have followed this process and can provide expert help if needed!What am I selling?This guide is all my experience distilled into a guide. It eliminates the need for any trial and error, and common pitfalls. It includes a section on the process and useful resources, PLUS a section showing you exactly how to duplicate my earnings. You can expect to do at least 400USD in a month if selling following my instructions and selling 5+ different accounts.Is this a get rich quick scheme?Actually, the earnings are separate to the method. You could use the method for personal use and never need or want to sell them, and it's still a great value. But, if you are interested in selling, absolutely not. It is providing a product (the accounts that you get) that is in high need, that can be easily produced. This method has been in use for 5+ years, and cannot become saturated as it's not a one off exploit, it's a general way of getting the accounts that can't be patched. The earnings are as valid today as they were 3 years ago.The earnings potential is around 400-800USD per month, with about 10 minutes per day of work on average after the initial set up (about 30mins-1hr). That 10 minutes is usually spent posting sales posts and replacing customers accounts. Earnings would depend on the amount of different accounts you sell.What accounts can I get?I include tools for 60 or so of the most popular accounts. Streaming services like HBO NOW, Netflix and Hulu, Music services like Deezer, Tidal and Spotify, a bunch of different food and gaming accounts, VP N services like NordVPN, ExpressVPN and others! However, the method works for many more accounts. I just can't include every single one out there. Chances are though, if you want a tool for a service that I don't include, it is available on the exclusive resources I have linked in the guide.The main guide includes everything needed to get popular accounts in fields like streaming (Spotify, HBO MAX, Instagram, Hulu, more), VPN (NordVPN, ExpressVPN, Tunnelbear, more) and many many more. It's written by someone who has done this process for years.This guide includesa general outline of the processmy support if needed for any reasonthe program that you use and useful resourcesa step by step walkthrough of the processoutlines exactly how to start your own shop and best practices to make the most money possible. If you follow these instructions, you will make money.a video tutorial I created to show the processall future updates so it never goes out of dateThe $35 option includes all this, plus a guide I wrote on upgrading accounts from free to premium like Spotify and YouTube premium.VOUCHES - I have many more then the 4 posted here. Check the links below. I have been selling this guide for 2 years, and have over 80 vouches. And many more on reddit that have since been lost! To see all my 80+ previous vouches on my old autobuy, go here - https://shoppy.gg/@KrivuTo see my most recent vouches on my other autobuy go here -  https://allaccountsfree.sellix.io/-----------------------------------------------(from autobuy) " Product is as described with downloads and detailed info. Value for sure"-----------------------------------------------(from autobuy) "Finally an actual way to do this without viruses, 5 stars"-----------------------------------------------(from autobuy) "Excellent product! Will recommend it"--------------------------------------------------(from autobuy) " No complaints info is very good"--------------------------------------------------Purchase my guide here https://allaccountsfree.sellix.io/Use code "lucky" for 15% off as a reward for your perseverance!

comments.author: IIrik11
comments.body: no offense but if ur that good why u need to sell this guide?seriously, if ur making as much as u say u r, wouldn't u try to keep it to urself so it doesn't get patched?

comments.author: Cornucopia
comments.body: Quote from: IIrik11 on October 09, 2022, 02:20:24 PMno offense but if ur that good why u need to sell this guide?seriously, if ur making as much as u say u r, wouldn't u try to keep it to urself so it doesn't get patched?Second income sources are always good, especially when I need to restock, etc. It's not an instant money glitch or anything but it can be decent side income with not much work outside of the initial setup if you do it right.Also, there's no danger of that because it's not a one off exploit that can be patched or a specific vulnerability, it's a general method that has been working for years and will continue to work because there isn't really a defense.
